text:
しかし、蓋を開けてみればどうだろう。 柔らかな女体とはほど遠い硬い男の身体、声だって低く、背丈も佐野より少しばかり大きい。 そんな己に彼は肉欲を抱くと言うのだ。 それも、抱きたいと。
言葉自体の意味は理解できていた、想像もできた、そうありたいと思った。 でも、『抱きたい』その言葉の本当の意味を理解したのは、今この瞬間である。
trans:
But when he opened the lid, what did he find? A body far from the softness of a woman - firm, masculine, with a low voice and a stature slightly taller than Sano's. And yet, he said he had a carnal desire for him. He wanted to hold him.
He understood the literal meaning of those words, he could imagine it, and he even wanted it to be so. However, it was only in this very moment that he truly grasped the real meaning of "wanting to hold."
